PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-14312018-11-22,  ,  IRCC,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Work Permit Exemption)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (WORK PERMIT EXEMPTION) in order to ensure that all individuals who enter Canada and are registered as Indians under the Indian Act are exempt from the requirement to obtain a work permit by amending the relevant work permit provision of the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0249 Publication Date: 2018-12-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Work Permit Exemption)
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (WORK PERMIT EXEMPTION) in order to ensure that all individuals who enter Canada and are registered as Indians under the Indian Act are exempt from the requirement to obtain a work permit by amending the relevant work permit provision of the Regulations.
